text: Oddleif Olavsen (9 October 1945 – 5 June 2022) was a Norwegian politician. He was a member of the Conservative Party. He was mayor of Bodø from 1995 to 1999. He then was on the Nordland County Council from 2003 to 2007. Before entering politics, he was a footballer and played for FK Bodø/Glimt. Olavsen died on 5 June 2022 at the age of 76. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Norwegian footballers Category:Norwegian mayors
title: Oddleif Olavsen
